productDescription: Embark on a cultural journey through the ancient ruins of Machu Picchu.
productItineraryItems: Day 3: Hike the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu
sourceVideoDescription: This video showcases the awe-inspiring beauty of Machu Picchu and the cultural significance of this ancient Inca city.
videoIntelligenceDescription: The video highlights the mystical ruins of Machu Picchu, the challenging Inca Trail, and the delicious Peruvian cuisine.
videoTextOnScreen: Discover the wonders of Machu Picchu
videoTranscript: Machu Picchu, an ancient marvel nestled in the Peruvian Andes. Embark on a journey to this mystical city, hike the challenging Inca Trail, and savor the flavors of traditional Peruvian cuisine.
